data.message: I am in love fb because we can get to know each other  and get friendship with someone who can be yr best friends ....you never know....

replies.message: That is very kind of you to say, Zahida! Thanks for being part of our community. -Chantal
Chantel How do you recover your password when you use the same email for both accounts and you can't find your password
Its  simple ...if you forgot yr password send yr request to fb they will send your password

Hi Debbie. If you can't log into Facebook and need to reset your password click the "Forgot your password?" option on the login page. Learn how: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/213395615347144 -Chantal

I did that over and over again I have two seperate  FB accounts and the same emails to sign up when I forgot my old password I did Try resetting it only worked for the new account I have went back and deleted my email off the account but I can still get into it it never deleted it like I tried  to do at the beginning if this makes any sense
Sounds simple but I have tried everything to reset password but can't get into it now just by going into it from this one never closed down just no email attached to old FB account
You can have only one account on fb I guess if there is something I can help you on that then layer on I will let you know ...just dont get upset every thing goona be fine
